SELECT Fusion_pair AS fusion_pair , IF(5Gene_Junction='NA', '', 5Gene_Junction) AS gene5Junc , IF(3Gene_Junction='NA', '', 3Gene_Junction) AS gene3Junc , IF(Breakpoint_Type='NA', '', Breakpoint_Type) AS breakpoint_type , IF(Cancertype='NA', '', Cancertype) AS cancertype , IF(BarcodeID='NA', '', BarcodeID) AS barcodeID , IF(Frame = "NA","",Frame) AS frame , IF(Chr_info='NA', '', Chr_info) AS chr_info , IF(Source='NA', '', Source) AS source , IF(ChimerKB='NA', '', ChimerKB) AS chimerKB , IF(ChimerPub='NA', '', ChimerPub) AS chimerPub , CONCAT(ChimerKB, "_", ChimerPub) AS supported , IF(T_gene='NA', '', T_gene) AS t_gene , IF(H_gene='NA', '', H_gene) AS h_gene , IF(T_gene='NA', '', T_chr) AS t_chr , IF(H_gene='NA', '', H_chr) AS h_chr , a.id FROM ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq a, ChimerDB3.ChimerSeq_Fulltext b WHERE a.id=b.id
AND (H_gene = #{byGeneTxt} OR T_gene = #{byGeneTxt})
AND H_gene = #{byGeneTxt}
AND T_gene = #{byGeneTxt}
AND Fusion_pair = #{byGenePairTxt}
AND (H_locus LIKE CONCAT(#{byChrLocusTxt}, '%') OR T_locus LIKE CONCAT(#{byChrLocusTxt}, '%'))
AND Disease LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{byDiseaseTxt}), '%')
AND Cancertype IN
#{cancer}
OR (Source = 'FusionScan' AND Seed_reads_num >= ${noOfSeedReads})
OR (Source = 'TopHat-Fusion' AND Spanning_pairs_num >= ${noOfSpaningPairs})
OR (Source = 'PRADA' AND Junction_reads_num >= ${noOfJunctionReads})
OR (Source = 'ChiTaRs')
OR (Source = 'ChimerDB2_SRA')
OR Kinase != 0
OR Oncogene != 0
OR Tumor_suppressor != 0
OR Receptor != 0
OR Transcription_Factor != 0
AND Chr_info IN ('Intra-chr', 'Inter-chr')
AND Chr_info = 'Inter-chr'
AND Chr_info = 'Intra-chr'
AND (ChimerKB != 0 OR ChimerPub != 0)
AND ChimerKB != 0 AND ChimerPub != 0
AND MATCH(b.all_columns) AGAINST( CONCAT(#{searchKeyword}, '*') IN BOOLEAN MODE)
ORDER BY ${sortKey + 1} ${sortOrderDir}
LIMIT ${start}, ${length}

SELECT a.tax_id ,a.gene_id ,a.symbol ,a.locus_tag ,a.synonyms ,a.dbxrefs , CASE WHEN a.chromosome LIKE 'chr%' THEN a.chromosome ELSE CONCAT('chr', a.chromosome) END AS chromosome ,a.map_location ,a.description ,a.type_of_gene ,a.symbol_from_nomenclature_authority ,a.full_name_from_nomenclature_authority ,a.nomenclature_status ,a.other_designations ,a.modification_date ,b.* FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM I1_Gene_Info a, ( SELECT gene_id FROM I1_GeneSymbol_Synonym WHERE MATCH(symbol) AGAINST(#{symbol} IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND symbol = #{symbol} ) b WHERE a.gene_id=b.gene_id AND a.chromosome=#{chr} ) a LEFT JOIN I1_GRCh37_GFF b ON b.Gene_ID=a.gene_id AND b.no BETWEEN a.gff_start AND a.gff_end AND b.type IN ('gene', 'exon', 'mRNA', 'transcript') ORDER BY b.no

SELECT * FROM I1_GRCh37_GFF a, ( SELECT gene_id, gff_start, gff_end FROM I1_Gene_Info a, ( SELECT gene_id FROM I1_GeneSymbol_Synonym WHERE MATCH(symbol) AGAINST(#{symbol} IN BOOLEAN MODE) AND symbol = #{symbol} ) b WHERE a.gene_id=b.gene_id ) b WHERE a.Gene_ID=b.gene_id AND a.no BETWEEN b.gff_start AND b.gff_end AND a.type IN ('gene', 'exon', 'mRNA', 'transcript') ORDER BY a.no
SELECT DISTINCT CancerType FROM ChimerSeq WHERE CancerType <> 'NA' ORDER BY CancerType

SELECT a.* FROM ChimerSeq_Pfam a, ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT a.id , (GREATEST(chromEnd, ${geneEnd}) - LEAST(chromStart, ${geneStart}) +1) AS val_max , ((chromEnd-chromStart+1) + (${geneEnd}-${geneStart}+1)) AS val_sum FROM ChimerSeq_Pfam a, ChimerSeq_Pfam_Chr b WHERE a.id BETWEEN b.start_id AND b.end_id AND b.chromosome=#{chromosome} ) a WHERE val_max < val_sum ) b WHERE a.id=b.id
